body_html:
Did you try using out docker containers?
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#InstallingDocker

Unfortunately, outside docker we cannot provide full ubuntu system images with tensorflow, due to licensing restrictions.

body:
Did you try using out docker containers?
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#InstallingDocker

Unfortunately, outside docker we cannot provide full ubuntu system images with tensorflow, due to licensing restrictions.
